thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com | 2 of 105
thread.title: Roy Dewell

author: Roy Dewell
title: Roy Dewell
text: I use OFX on an occassional basis to send money to my son in New Zealand. Once the account is set up it is really easy to use and quicker for delivery than most other commercial services. Charges are reasonable. Some times other companies under cut with "special offers", but for peace of mind and reliabilty I stick with OFX which works for me. Plus if you do have problems their staff are really helpful.
